title: What is the purpose of the <head> element in an HTML document?

title: Which object-oriented programming concept does JavaScript support?
What is the purpose of the 'this' keyword in JavaScript?
answer_1: It refers to the current HTML document
answer_2: It refers to the function in which it's used
answer_3: It refers to the parent object of the current object

right_answer: It refers to the current object

title: What does the CSS property 'position: absolute;' do?
answer_1: Positions an element relative to its parent
answer_2: Positions an element relative to the viewport
answer_3: Positions an element absolutely within its containing element
answer_4: Positions an element randomly on the page
right_answer: Positions an element absolutely within its containing element

title: What is the purpose of the CSS 'box-sizing' property?
answer_1: To specify the box-shadow of an element

right_answer: To include the padding and border in an element's total width and height
